column5: Got these pics in the mail today and thaught I'd share them with you Solo mission for him and an all day event dragging this buck out of the bush.... here's a map of where he was and where he needed to go    Shot it last Sunday at 9:15am uphill on a 45 degree angle through the liver, it ran an extra 400 yards before he finally found him along the shoreline      Here's the man with his prize    Hope you enjoy!!! Leechman
Damn good thing he ran the first 400 yards for him!!!!
what did he shoot it with?
Ha Ha @ irish....too funny.  Great report, can't wait to get out!

Right on - Nice buck I hope i get as lucky 400 yards is quite the drag  you might wanna change the name of your thread to muzzle loader - people might get the wrong idea about your ancestry.....hahaha
Muzzle loader   LOL yeah I just noticed the typo.... corrected now
Myself,I would like to be put down before I was dragged 400 yards.Bump,clip a branch and over some rocks,all on an empty belly.  Nice buck and congrats to the harvester.
